meanings.sent1: She trendified her outfit by adding a stylish scarf.
meanings.sent2: The new store trendified the neighborhood with its modern decor.
meanings.sent3: The cat trendified its look by wearing a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her smile trendified the room, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful artwork trendified the plain walls, adding life to the space.

meanings.sent1: The trendified dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: His trendified hairstyle was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: The trendified cupcakes were almost too stylish to eat.
meanings.sent4: The trendified car stood out among the ordinary vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The trendified shoes completed her fashionable look perfectly.
